name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Derrick CLARK, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Derrick CLARK, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
40 A.3d 1232
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Derrick CLARK, Petitioner.
No. 152 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 28, 2012.
